merch-info.title: Manufacturing Questions - poroful's Ko-fi Shop
merch-info.description: A digital zine about the basics of contacting merchants, by poroful.

merch-info.title: MAKE STICKERS AT HOME: how to set up a sticker sheet with your Cricut
merch-info.description: A Youtube video about how to set up a sticker sheet with your Cricut - which is possibly your best option if you plan on being a long-term sticker seller.

merch-info.title: OPENING A STICKER SHOP! | Tools, Costs, Shipping, and MORE!
merch-info.description: Goes into PO boxes, drawing and cutting tools, sticker paper, printers, packing supplies, shipping resources, and cameras.

merch-info.title: How to Make Enamel Pins - YouTube Playlist
merch-info.description: An extremely in depth playlist, covers everything from what pins are, to how to design for them, to how to find manufacturers, to the advertising and shipping of them, and more!

merch-info.title: The Best Custom Enamel Pin Manufacturers and How To Work With Them - Pinlord
merch-info.description: Resources on how to find reliable pin factories, with info on pricing, turnaround time, payment methods, and communication.

merch-info.title: What you should know before making enamel pins
merch-info.description: Things to consider before ordering enamel pins.

merch-info.title: Pinlord's List of Ethical Pin Manufacturers
merch-info.description: A list of ethical manufacturers, based in China and elsewhere.

merch-info.title: Printing Terms and Industry Standards
merch-info.description: A helpful and short list of the most important printing terms.

merch-info.title: PIM's Glossary of Print Terms
merch-info.description: A much larger, 51 page long glossary of printing terms.

gen-merch.title: Zap! Creatives
gen-merch.description:
Jewelry, charms, keychains, phone charms, stickers, pins, badges, and standees. Has acrylic, metal, and wood options.
Seems to be one of the most recommended companies. Is based in the UK and ships worldwide. They have a ton of options of different materials and extras.

gen-merch.title: VOGRACE
gen-merch.description:
Keychains, stickers, standees, printing, notebooks, sticky notes, washi tape, pins, throw pillows, lanyards & more.
The other most recommended companies, this one is based in China. It basically handles the Alibaba ordering for you so you don't need to deal directly with vendors, bulk orders, and the large shipping costs. If you're doing smaller orders, using a middle-man like this can work a lot easier. They also likely have the most options of all the sites.

gen-merch.title: Alchemy Merch
gen-merch.description: Does typical things like pins, stickers, and charms, but also has a large range of unique and hard to find options, such as: beanies, bottle openers, mousepads, fans, pencil cases, needle minders, slip mats, socks, and elastic wristbands. Has a 4 week turnaround. They also take crypto as payment.

gen-merch.title: Acorn Press
gen-merch.description: An acrylic charm producer with a simple order form and flat $10-25 shipping. MOQ of 10, and an estimated turnaround time of 15 business days + shipping. They have a very clear and simple webpage and allow for detailed communication.

gen-merch.title: Playmat World
gen-merch.description: A Canadian shop with worldwide shipping that does custom playmats, card sleeves, deck boxes, mouse pads, and wall scrolls.

gen-merch.title: PrintInkling
gen-merch.description: An apparel, dice bag, patch, and sticker shop that takes custom orders through an email quote. Uses old school printing techniques, and has a MOQ of 12.

gen-merch.title: Stadri Emblems
gen-merch.description: A shop that focuses on embroidered patches and enamel pins, and some more products. Based in New York, and ship worldwide.

print-shops.title: GotPrint
print-shops.description:
General printing, plus signs, banners, boards, decals, etc.
Considered to be one of the best custom print shops for the ratio of price to quality.

print-shops.title: CatPrint
print-shops.description: A print shop with art print options. They are laser prints on thick smooth cardstock, sold at cheaper prices than fine art archival ones, but are of typical quality of the con-artist scene. America based, but has international shipping.

print-shops.title: FinerWorks
print-shops.description: Noted for being good with art prints. Also does posters, canvas, and more. Uses archival paper and ink, with a lot of different paper options.

print-shops.title: Moo
print-shops.description: Considered to be one of the higher quality print shops, though with high prices. Has some uncommon options such as planners and water bottles. Has worldwide shipping.

print-shops.title: printshaQ
print-shops.description: There is less information about this site than the others, however they've been noted to have good satin finishes on their cards. American shipping only.

print-shops.title: Your local print shop
print-shops.description: Look around and see what print shops are in your area! This is the one area of merchandise printing that is likely to be available locally. Fedex in particular is a common chain known to have good print-on-demand.

sticker-shops.title: LilyLlamaPrints - Etsy
sticker-shops.description: A professional sticker print shop on Etsy, based out of Miami. Only seems to ship within the USA. You order the type you want, and they follow up with an email where they get the information on the printing.

sticker-shops.title: Sticker Blitz
sticker-shops.description: A sticker shop based in the USA. They ship to the USA and Canada, with free shipping available within America. They offer samples, and do not have a MOQ.

sticker-shops.title: awstickers
sticker-shops.description: A sticker shop with worldwide shipping, and flexible pricing based on a quote. They have a turnaround time of 4-7 business days, though allow rush orders.

sticker-shops.title: MakeStickers
sticker-shops.description: A sticker shop that is apparently pretty quick and cheap. They offer USA and Canada shipping, and free standard USA shipping.

sticker-shops.title: Sticker Ninja
sticker-shops.description: A sticker shop that is considered to be one of the higher quality shops, though has prices to match. Ships to America and colonies, Canada, and Mexico.

sticker-shops.title: Sticker Mule
sticker-shops.description:
Stickers, labels, custom packaging, magnets, tshirts, and more.
Has been around for awhile and is mentioned a lot, particularly for their stickers. They have a bunch of extra tools that help you with image scaling, vectorization, and also shipping. Their non-sticker products are not as highly rated as their stickers.

sticker-shops.title: StickerApp
sticker-shops.description: A sticker and label printing shop. Is generally considered to be a decent budget option. Has various material options including holographic and kraft. Is noted to sometimes have issues with the borders of stickers.

sticker-shops.title: Rockin Monkey
sticker-shops.description: A sticker shop that has a long lead time, but is noted to have good holographic and glitter stickers. Ships worldwide.

sticker-shops.title: StandOut Stickers
sticker-shops.description: A budget brand that has most products made in America. Has worldwide shipping and carbon-neutral shipping options.

sticker-shops.title: 123 Sticker
sticker-shops.description: A small and old business based in Oregon with good prices.

sticker-shops.title: Death By Stickers
sticker-shops.description: A small business based in New Jersey. Also does pins, banners, etc. Ships within America. Has no MOQ and good quality.

sticker-shops.title: Vinyl Disorder
sticker-shops.description: I mostly see them being called a cheaper Sticker Mule, while still having good quality. Ships worldwide.

sticker-shops.title: Sticker Bunnies
sticker-shops.description: Is cheap and has no MOQ, but is known to sometimes have a long response time. You can order a $3 sample pack of all their sticker types. Their website seems to be a bit…barren, but apparently had a good local presence before the site.

canada-shops.title: Clubcard
canada-shops.description: A Canada-based sticker and print shop, including fine art prints.

canada-shops.title: Jukebox Print
canada-shops.description: A Canada-based sticker and print shop.

canada-shops.title: Sira Print Inc.
canada-shops.description: A Canadian-based sticker shop, with free shipping available. Considered to be pretty decent.

canada-shops.title: Art Ink Print
canada-shops.description: Fine art printing, with a good amount of options, such as prints, canvas, and calendars. They have “new artist” budget bundles if you're looking to bulk order.

canada-shops.title: Sticker You
canada-shops.description: A sticker company that also does things like temporary tattoos, iron-ons, and static clings. Based in Toronto, with worldwide shipping.
